mapper.select: select customer_code,b.name,b.contact,manager_name,manager_grade,manager_contact,manager_email,manager_birth,time,address,positionX,positionY from user as a, customer as b where a.id=b.id and dept=#{dept};

select customer_code,name,contact,manager_name,manager_grade,manager_contact,manager_email,manager_birth,time,address,positionX,positionY,state from user as a, customer as b where a.id=b.id and dept=#{dept} and name=#{name};
select customer_code from customer order by customer_code desc limit 1;
mapper.update: update customer set name=#{name}, contact=#{contact},manager_name=#{manager_name}, manager_grade=#{manager_grade},manager_contact=#{manager_contact},manager_birth=#{manager_birth},time=#{time},address=#{address},positionX=#{positionX},positionY=#{positionY} where customer_code=#{customer_code};
mapper.select: select name,positionX, positionY from customer where id=#{id};
